Html:
Hello,

I have the following situation:

* No connection to internet, because of security reasons

* All tiles that i need as files in osm like path structure

What is the best solution for using Gmap.net?

I think I will use an MS SQL as SecondChache.

How can I import the tile files into the Server?

I have look into the source of gmap.net. There will be need one table.

What is in the field 'type'?

Thanks.

Best Regards.

Gerhard

You mean I should set the sql database as DbId?

How could I do this?

Gerhard
no, i mean if you manually insert tiles into database, use provider.DbId as type column value

Does there already exist an import tool for gmap.net?

Gerhard
nop, but if you want prefetch selected area, you can use demos
